TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit IteratorStateMachineAttribute extends System.Runtime.CompilerServices.StateMachineAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class IteratorStateMachineAttribute Inherits StateMachineAttribute

summary.span: 指出 Visual Basic 的方法是否以 修飾詞標記。

span.span: Indicates whether a method in Visual Basic is marked with the modifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您不應該套用`IteratorStateMachine`屬性設定為您的程式碼中的方法。You shouldn't apply the `IteratorStateMachine` attribute to methods in your code. 在 Visual Basic 中的方法具有[迭代器](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/iterator.md)修飾詞，編譯器將會套用`IteratorStateMachine`中的 IL，就會發出屬性。For methods in Visual Basic that have the [Iterator](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/iterator.md) modifier, the compiler will apply the `IteratorStateMachine` attribute in the IL that it emits. 當方法 (*MethodName*) 在 Visual Basic 中有`Iterator`修飾詞，編譯器會發出包含狀態機器結構的 IL。When a method (*MethodName*) in Visual Basic has the `Iterator` modifier, the compiler emits IL that includes a state machine structure. 該結構包含在方法中的程式碼。That structure contains the code in the method. IL 也包含虛設常式方法 (*MethodName*)，呼叫狀態機器。That IL also contains a stub method (*MethodName*) that calls into the state machine. 編譯器會加入`IteratorStateMachine`屬性加入虛設常式方法，以便工具可以識別對應的狀態機器。The compiler adds the `IteratorStateMachine` attribute to the stub method so that tools can identify the corresponding state machine. 發出的 IL 的詳細資料可能會在未來版本中變更的編譯器。Details of the emitted IL might change in future releases of the compilers. 迭代器方法使用，執行自訂反覆項目在集合上`Yield`(Visual Basic) 陳述式來傳回每個項目一次。An iterator method performs a custom iteration over a collection by using the `Yield` (Visual Basic) statement to return each element one at a time. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Iterator](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f45331db-d595-46ec-9142-551d3d1eb1a7)。For more information, see [Iterators](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f45331db-d595-46ec-9142-551d3d1eb1a7). > [!NOTE] > 您無法使用`IteratorStateMachineAttribute`測試方法是否在 C# 中的迭代器方法。You can't use `IteratorStateMachineAttribute` to test whether a method is an iterator method in C#. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何判斷方法是否是迭代器方法。The following example shows how to determine whether a method is an iterator method. 在範例中，`IsIteratorMethod`執行下列步驟：In the example, `IsIteratorMethod` performs the following steps: - 取得物件所使用的方法名稱。Obtains a object for the method name by using . - 取得使用屬性的物件[GetType 運算子](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/operators/gettype-operator.md)。Obtains a object for the attribute by using [GetType Operator](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/operators/gettype-operator.md). - 使用取得的方法和屬性類型的屬性物件`MethodInfo.GetCustomAttribute`。Obtains an attribute object for the method and attribute type by using `MethodInfo.GetCustomAttribute`. 如果`GetCustomAttribute`傳回`Nothing`(Visual Basic)，此方法不包含屬性。If `GetCustomAttribute` returns `Nothing` (Visual Basic), the method doesn't contain the attribute. [!code-vb[Runtime.CompilerServices.AsyncStateMachineAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/runtime.compilerservices.asyncstatemachineattribute/vb/module2.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type stateMachineType) cil managed

param.name: stateMachineType
param.span: 基礎狀態機器類型的類型物件，該類型會被用來實作狀態機器方法。

span.span: The type object for the underlying state machine type that's used to implement a state machine method.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
